root.name: 3x3 Eyes: Seima Kourin Den
root.description: Overview3x3 Eyes: Seima Kourin Den is a role-playing game developed and published by Yutaka for the SNES platform. 3x3 Eyes: Seima Kourin Den was only released in Japan and is based on the manga series 3x3 Eyes.Gameplay3x3 Eyes: Seima Kourin Den is a traditional turn based Japanese role-playing game.
